ROOT.STRING: Briton
Left click on Boadicea.
Click on the move button.
Left click on the flag to have Boadicea move there.
Move your mouse to the top edge of the screen to start scrolling up.
Select the move button
Left click on the flag on the other side of the unexplored area.
Roll the mousewheel back or press PageUp twice to zoom out.
Scroll to the top right of the screen to find Briton.
Move Boadicea to the flag outside her village.
Scroll to the bottom right to find the Roman camp.
Move your mouse over the Roman barracks
Select all troops with a drag box.
Right-click near the Roman camp to move your troops into the camp.
Destroy Roman army
Destroy Roman barracks
Destroy Roman lookout
Briton is under attack! Right-click to move your troops to defend the city!
